entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
